title: Rahu Transit in the 10th House for Libra Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 10th house for Libra ascendant, career, authority, and public image undergo rapid amplification. Ambition rises sharply, with a strong urge to gain recognition, power, and status. Unconventional career paths, sudden promotions, or controversial visibility are possible. While strategic moves can bring success, shortcuts, manipulation, or image-obsession can damage credibility. This transit rewards disciplined ambition, ethical leadership, and long-term vision over instant fame.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Focus shifts to status and power

closing: This transit magnifies ambition and visibility. With discipline and ethics, Rahu converts power-seeking into lasting professional authority.
